price: 177. Tokkel Ni-digaalá ken dabooqal (maaftal) keenil obta waqdi, toysa meesiisen marih maaci maxxu yoomeeh!
arabic: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nazala bisāḥatihim fasāa ṣabāḥu al-mundharīna
